text: Stuntmasterz were a British music group featuring Steve Harris, Rob Davis and Pete Cook. They are best known for their hit single "The Ladyboy Is Mine", a mash-up of the songs "The Boy Is Mine" by Brandy & Monica, and Modjo's "Lady (Hear Me Tonight)". The song peaked at number 10 on the UK Singles Chart in March 2001. ==Discography== *"Holiday Sounds Better with You" (1998), Sick & Twisted *"The Ladyboy Is Mine" (2001), EastWest - UK #10 ==References== Category:British musical trios Category:English dance music groups Category:English DJs
title: Stuntmasterz
